None.Name: Ice Blast
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, unit hurls an ice blast that deals 17 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 25 in total.

None.Name: Ice Shield
None.Description: Activate to apply Ice Shield on a friendly unit. Absorbs up to 520 damage for 30 seconds. Reusable every 10 seconds.
